topic: Deep dive: _pylong standard library module in Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: Deep dive: _pylong standard library module in Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Deep Dive: pylong - The New Standard Library Module in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: Exploring the new pylong module, a comprehensive tool for managing long lines and large source files in Python 3.12+.
key_points: pylong is a standard library module introduced in Python 3.12
It helps manage long lines and large source files
Supports breaking long lines at whitespace characters
Offers multiple break strategies for custom line splitting
Enhances readability and maintainability of large codebases

code_examples.code:
from pylong import pylong
pylong.set_strategy('word-wrap')
# This will wrap long strings at word boundaries

version_notes: Continuous improvements and optimizations expected in future versions
caveats: Not all break strategies may produce optimal results for every situation
Manual intervention might be required to fine-tune line breaking when necessary
